name: AHierarchicalLODVolume
doc: An invisible volume used to manually define/create an HLOD cluster.

bIncludeOverlappingActors: When set this volume will incorporate actors which bounds overlap with the volume, otherwise only actors which are completely inside of the volume are incorporated
ApplyOnlyToSpecificHLODLevels: If set, this volume will only be applied to HLOD levels contained in the array.  If empty, it will apply to ALL HLOD levels
